name: SANA Sesimbra Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The sea view is just perfect! Staff is friendly and the rooms are clean and comfortable! Perfect for a weekend at the sea with excellent seafood restaurants around! Village is a really nice and clean typicall fishing village.
reviews.title: Perfect Gatheway!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Things are not perfect here, not at all. Don’t misunderstand me, the hotel is beautiful (specially by night), the room view was magnificent but still it lacked quality on some important aspects…
reviews.title: Cool hotel, but not what I was expecting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It all started at lunch, as we decided to eat and wait for the check-in time. Ingredients’ quality were average and the meal was simply tasteless. Staff at the reception was always professional and friendly. Room had the average size and the balcony overlooking the beach is a big plus. Even though the room smelled good and seemed to be clean, it wasn’t. Apart from sand, we even found nails apparently from the previous guests. As this wasn’t bad enough, the sound proofing was absolutely horrible which turned my night into a nightmare.
reviews.title: great hotel in Sesimbra

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: By the time of breakfast, it seemed really unimaginative. The croissants were really good, but watery scrambled eggs and undercooked bacon turned the breakfast into other disappointing meal. We had to leave to room by mid-day, but the staff gave us some additional towels so we could make use of the swimming pool or the beach, if we wanted to.
reviews.title: An impressive hotel but

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Given the fact that we stayed at the Summer and prices are normally higher, our stay didn’t seem worth the money paid. We don’t withdraw chances of returning but if such happens, this hotel simply needs to improve.
reviews.title: Great location, quality hotel, terrible restaurant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 10 days in September on a b+ b basis.Hotel is 15 metres from Atlantic.Definately pay for a sea view room.Staff are very friendly and helpful.The hotel is kept very clean.Breakfast is ok but room can get a bit crowded with people if hotel full.We had an evening meal in the hotel which was very good,but like every hotel not suitable to some people with different tastes.Plenty of restaurants around too many to mention but try Restaurante Marisqueira [out of reception swing doors turn right 20 metres for a great fish restaurante]A very good snack bar adjacent to hotel called Doce Real..Rooms are large enough with plenty of space,mini bar and free safe plus good air conditioning.Bathrooms possibly in need of re grouting.Bar is a problem because it is main restaurante where people are eating,so most people venture out..[ Very reasonable prices in bar except imported spirits,which are a bit pricey even for a 4 star] The beach is absolutely gorgeous which is kept very clean.An ideal holiday town for families and couples of all ages.Very nice hotel in a lovely fishing town with lovely people.Hotel will arrange a taxi from airport for about 60 euros each way.
reviews.title: Good hotel with an excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights on B+B basis in a sea view room on the 4th floor.
reviews.title: Bright, bustling hotel on sea front

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The hotel is well located just across the road from the long sandy beach and less than 5 mins walk from several nice fish restaurants. A well-run, informal hotel
reviews.title: Do you really want to go there???

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Pros
reviews.title: great hotel with a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: *Location so close to the beach and centre
reviews.title: Good location for a Corporate weekend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: We went back again to this paradise-like hotel in Sesimbra, an old fisherman's village around Lisbon and my favourite beach in Portugal.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel, top location, top staff!!!...Stayed in paradise again...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The hotel is truly Top location, just over the charming California Beach, just cross the street and there you are on the sand... On the other hand the hotel is located too at the very centre of Sesimbra, on the main street along the seaside, flanked by shops, nice restaurants and coffee shops -- top location indeed!!!...
reviews.title: Really nice 4* hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We always need to book in advance, because it' s usually full, due to Sesimbra nice weather the year round and to it's amazing location, and on the other hand to ithe hotel outstanding level.
reviews.title: Very typical but good corporate hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are spacious, very cosy, spectacular veranda overlooking the beach and the whole bay (amazing specially by sunset) with floor to ceiling glass wall, that means we can have a wonderful seaview even from bed!!!...
reviews.title: Review of Sana Sesimbra Hotel June & Eoin Rossiter ( 6th to 13th October 2012

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything is spotlessly clean in all areas from rooms to lobby.
reviews.title: BAD FOOD AND VALUE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You cannot beat the ocean views from the seaside rooms at this hotel. Our room was large enough and very comfortable. Staff were friendly and helpful. The internet worked great and breakfast was quite good as well. The hotel is not that hard to find, but parking is. So be prepared to use the hotel garage. We were lucky to be there on a not so busy evening. I suspect that during the busier times a spot in the garage might be an issue and street parking appeared to be hard to find. The seaside location is really convenient those "beach walks". The sound of the surf on the beach at night was quite nice, but, you can also get a fair amount of automobile noise and loud night owls returning to their homes or hotels. Thus keeping the doors closed keeps out that noise as well as the surf. There are a large number of good seafood restaurants near the hotel. We enjoyed our brief stay in Sesimbra and can definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great Setting/Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On top of the Sesimbra beach, it's a quality city hotel on the beach.
reviews.title: Breathtaking view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Usually a beach hotel lacks some city hotel quality, not this one, it's of higher standards.
reviews.title: A Good Surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Checking in and out is very quick and the hotel staff quite helpfull and nice.
reviews.title: Another fantastic stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Rooms are not as big as the Sesimbra Spa Hotel, but much quieter.
reviews.title: The hotel is right on the ocean, 10 meters from the beach

description: Right on the seafront, in the centre of Vila de Sesimbra, SANA Sesimbra Hotel is the ideal place for those seeking sun and sea and recreation and events, nature, gastronomy and wines, water sports, culture or scenery. With the Serra da Arrábida as a backdrop, SANA Sesimbra Hotel also has the advantage of being just 30 minutes from Lisbon. The hotel offers infrastructures unique to Sesimbra - on the roof of the hotel, the swimming pool with retractable cover, bar with outdoor area and sky lounge with Jacuzzi offer a fantastic panoramic view over the mountains and the sea. On the ground floor, the restaurant terrace is ideal for a meal by the beach. Each room at the SANA Sesimbra Hotel has been totally refurbished, offering increased comfort and well-being.
